snippet: Lincoln Center Festival’s retrospective of works by Anne Teresa De Keersmaeker concluded with “Bartok/Mikrokosmos.”
abstract: Brian Seibert reviews dance performance Bartok/Mikrokosmos at Gerald W Lynch Theater; piece is final installment of the Lincoln Center Festival's retrospective of works by choreographer Anne Teresa de Keersmaeker.
lead_paragraph: Lincoln Center Festival’s retrospective of works by Anne Teresa De Keersmaeker concluded with “Bartok/Mikrokosmos.”

headline.main: Clad in Shorter Skirts, the Better to Let Loose
headline.print_headline: Clad in Shorter Skirts, the Better to Let Loose
